neighbors.name: Herbert L. & Joyce K. Dickens
neighbors.claims: Herbert L. and Joyce K. Dickens own the home at 9723 Donahoo Road in Kansas City, KS [TruePeopleSearch](https://truepeoplesearch.net/people/herbert-dickens). Their property spans 1.58 acres and includes a house built in 1979 [Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/9723-Donahoo-Rd-Kansas-City-KS-66109/75713581_zpid/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a trusted longtime community member reach out personally, emphasizing that the development will not disrupt the quiet rural atmosphere or scenic views they have enjoyed on their property.

neighbors.name: William L. & Kelli A. Carmack
neighbors.claims: William L. and Kelli A. Carmack reside on Hurrelbrink Road in the rural Piper area of Kansas City, KS [Spokeo](https://www.idcrawl.com/kelli-carmack). Public records indicate Kelli Carmack lived in Clovis, California, before moving to Kansas City, KS [MyLife](https://www.idcrawl.com/kelli-carmack).
neighbors.influence_justification: No known civic roles; private residents

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Carmacks with a straightforward, factual discussion addressing how their property values and peace and quiet will be protected. A small neighborhood Q&A session could help answer their questions and build trust.

neighbors.name: Neal P. & Nicole M. Edwards
neighbors.claims: Neal P. and Nicole M. Edwards are the owners of a residence at 9805 McGurk Road in Kansas City, KS [FreePeopleSearch](https://freepeoplesearch.com/Edwards/Neal/). Neal Edwards is about 54 years old and previously lived at 3725 Freeman Avenue in Kansas City, KS [FreePeopleSearch](https://freepeoplesearch.com/Edwards/Neal/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Highlight any community benefits from the project (like improved roads or tax revenue for local services) and proactively address potential traffic or safety concerns in person, perhaps with a local official available to answer their questions.

overview_summary: All three neighbors are private residents with no recorded public stance on development or clean energy (each is classified as "unknown" stance). None hold any official positions or notable community leadership roles, so their individual influence is considered low.
